title: Online access
copy: No more remembering usernames and passwords for email access. No more identity theft

title: Financial Institutions
copy: No need for an ATM card, and no need to enter a pin at the ATM. Customers and employees will be free from breaches stemming from phishing.

title: Piracy
copy: Stop piracy dead in its tracks. Ensure that licensed software is only used by the individual or corporation authorized.
